trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler 委派中指定的方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanging` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式 Web 組件事件加`OnDisplayModeChanging`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 如何︰ 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。
